website_summaries.verdict: A great way to add some simple, minimal style to any room or hallway. Will stand out as a focal point.
pros: Elegant-looking finish goes well with many different interior styles
Plenty of tabletop space for small or medium objects
cons: Metal frame can twist when assembling

customer_reviews.title: Love the look, but note that it's a bit short for a console table.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this table, great look, easy to assemble. It is shorter than I expected which is why I gave it 4 stars. Measure your height first and make sure it will work. It's 28" high. I'm still very happy, purchased because I loved the look and still do so it works but I'd LOVE it if it were maybe 32" high.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole G

customer_reviews.title: Great table, great price!
customer_reviews.text: This table was easy to assemble, and looks great in its intended space. It is sturdy and the quality is better than I expected. I am seriously considering purchasing the matching coffee table.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great and Packaged Well
customer_reviews.text: I use this behind my couch to keep phone chargers, remotes and other items I need close by. The table was a little shorter than the back of my couch, so I bought lifts to elevate it. Looks better and is more accessible for what I need. It was very easy to put it together. Shouldn't take longer than 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: TyLittleTechGuyDad

customer_reviews.title: Entryway Awesomeness
customer_reviews.text: Had been struggling to find a console table to organize everyday items at HomeGoods for less than $100 that didn’t look cheap and fit our modern boho decor style....until this! Easy to assemble, love the contrast of the wood and metal, and a great size. The legs are slightly wobbly, but that could be either the uneven floors or the fact we overtightned the screws. Would buy again for perhaps a desk or a plant stand or sofa table!!
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described, perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: The table is exactly as specified, looks as shown, assembled easily and is sturdy enough for the purpose. If real estate is all about location location location, designing an interior space is all about measurements colour and more measurements. This table was perfect for the space and use it was purchased for: Specifically to go over and around a protruding wall through air conditioner the architect placed dead center under a window. Now that “dead” space has been “reclaimed”.
customer_reviews.author: Ken NYC

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in my space
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my space! Super easy assembly. I needed a skinny concole style of table to put along a wall in my dining area. This Sauder North Avenue Console table fits the bill perfectly. The "wood" charter oak color goes well with a modern decor. I'd definetly consider purchasing other pieces from this collection.
customer_reviews.author: EE

customer_reviews.title: Good hidden behind couch
customer_reviews.text: This is a good piece for behind the couch. Doesn't look good free standing but product is a good value if you are looking for a table behind couch or behind a corner bed to sit lamps on.
customer_reviews.author: FlipMeScotty

customer_reviews.title: I love these tables
customer_reviews.text: I love these tables. They are light but sturdy, simple, easy to assemble, the wood top is brown and grey with a weathered look. I put two of them end to end in a long hallway. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi 2 4

customer_reviews.title: Found this perfect table for my "situation"
customer_reviews.text: Found this perfect table for my "situation".. sits in front of a heating vent and electrical outlet so I needed something opened at the bottom.. just wide and deep enough for a flat screen TV in the guest room... AND I can fit a "small fireplace unit' under it in the winter months.... very functional!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Saunders

customer_reviews.title: The laminate top is definitely better than I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: For the price and what it is you can't beat it. The laminate top is definitely better than I was expecting. Super easy and quick to put it together. It isn't on display so I have no need to talk about its visual beauty... it's just a table and it works and it is sturdy enough..meaning it isn't a wobbly piece of junk. 50 buck with shipping! who can really complain? Hope it lasts longer than a week. I mean you get what yo pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Kae S.

customer_reviews.title: It was great till I put it together
customer_reviews.text: There were no instructions with this table so I just put it together with the picture on the front of the box. When I screwed in the bolts to hold it together they went right through to the top of the wood and cracked it. When I was all done assembling it I turned it over and noticed that the wood on top now has four cracks in it where the screws were too long for the job. I am not sending it back because I need it for my plants that I brought in to keep out of the snow. If it wasn't freezing and snowing today I certainly would have sent it back. Be careful when assembling!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 55" TV - Sturdy and minimalistic look
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect much for the price, but WOW, the quality blew me away! It is heavy and sturdy! Plus, the wood is beautiful - almost perfect. I got lucky since the date on there was 12/2019, so it's fairly new. Assembly, no question, is a breeze. There were no washers, but I think they were never included - the instructions has the drawing that looks like washers, but it's actually a top view of the screws that were included. Only 4 stars because of the slow shipping (3 days late!!) - although, Amazon did compensate me for it ($5 credit, but hey, it's better than nothing)! All in all, this was a good deal for a high quality product!
customer_reviews.author: TheOasis

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than imagined
customer_reviews.text: A lot smaller than I imagined, should have measured it out before I purchased but it looks nice and I’ll likely repurpose it somewhere else in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Giuffrida

customer_reviews.title: Excellent table, especially for the price (pay attention to the finish though!!)
customer_reviews.text: Excellent table, especially for the price. Table top seems surprisingly hefty and durable as well. One thing I will say is that while the finish is great, MAKE SURE YOU LOOK CLOSELY AT THE PHOTOS (reviewer photos too). The finish has this perpendicular lines on it (I mistook them for scratches at first) which you may or may not like. Since it's there in ALL the photos (product photos and reviews) I guess that's just the way it is. Not my preference but if you like it, definitely consider buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check Amazon Warehouse First!
customer_reviews.text: This table is a great simple option. I highly recommend it. I bought this table from Amazon warehouse, and it was roughly $15 cheaper than buying it new. I suggest checking Amazon Warehouse options when buying furniture as I have never had a negative experience with the used/returned items and I save quite a bit of money. It came with all of the hardware and instructions and it only took me 10 minutes to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Tbot

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble & Fits Budget
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table because it goes with the other furniture I purchased from the same company. All of their pieces are easy to assemble and are budget friendly. They're modern, but still you get what you pay for in the end. It's mostly sturdy, especially on solid floors (e.g. hardwood or laminate) but not so great on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Solid piece
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid piece of furniture, easy to assemble and very versatile. I love that with the open area underneath the various ways it can be used is awesome. Slide storage cubbies under it, rubbage containers, our dog bed actually fits perfectly under it, and we’ve used it for a lap top desk. It’s so versatile our biggest issue is figuring out where we love it the most. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa J

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! Simple table, easy to assemble and reasonably priced!
customer_reviews.text: Obviously it’s not west elm quality but for a small table to fill some space it’s perfect. Probably won’t hold very heavy objects but it’s perfect for small spaces or college students needing a table/desk without spending lots on something you’ll have to move after the school year. Lightweight but still sturdy! Very easy to assemble and it seems like it would be hard to break! You could easily disassemble and box it back up to move! I love it, considering a second for my bedroom as a mini vanity area! Can’t beat that price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bedroom TV stand!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this table to use as a TV stand for our 32-inch TV in the bedroom. We live in a smaller apartment and the bedroom doesn't have much room for a big TV stand, so this table was perfect. Assembling the stand was easy, and I was able to have it fully assembled in minutes. The color of the wood fits our room perfectly. Couldn't be happier with this table, really great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M.

customer_reviews.title: It's easy and quick
customer_reviews.text: What is there to say? I needed a small foyer table and didn't want to spend a bundle. This absolutely did the job. Arrived well-packed and intact. Instructions are very clear and with a bit of humor. All that is needed is the enclosed Allen head wrench. Went together and was in place in 10 min. Hey.....it's not real wood, but I wasn't looking for an heirloom!! It will definitely do the job. Well-made, easy assembly, it all fits as it should. What else could you want??
customer_reviews.author: pmthomas

customer_reviews.title: Very nice console table but mars easily
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table just to hold my herbs and flowering plants that have to be brought inside in the winter time. Fits under my living room window just fine. Easy to put together. I did it by myself in less than 10 minutes. Directions are easy to follow. I gave it 3 stars because the surface chips very easily. It wasn't up 5 minutes before a family member manages to take a chunk out of the surface and remove the wood finish just by leaning something heavy on it. Fortunately, the plants cover the damage.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh A. Delany

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what we needed and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Although it's pretty and quite well made, it's not a showpiece, i.e. you get what you paid for. However, it works great for what we needed it for and easily holds a heavy lamp and plants. The top had a scratch in it when we first got it. I called right away and their customer service was outstanding. I just had to describe what the problem was and on which part, give them my address, and the replacement was on its way. Took about 2 minutes. I can absolutely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Franziska Moran

customer_reviews.title: But it!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant at buying due to the height. After reading and seeing everyone’s reviews and pictures I decided to try. That is after shopping around , I found the same exact table for $80 at Ross. It’s the same exact thing , and cheaper here. After receiving I’m glad I waited and purchased to buy it on here. It was super easy to put together and great quality for the price paid. The height isn’t even an issue. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: LaTara Lyew

customer_reviews.title: Looks fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I love this entryway table. Definitely what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin

customer_reviews.title: Great console table for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good console table for less than $50. It arrived very well-packaged with sturdy cardboard pieces across all of the edges. As a result, everything inside was in perfect condition. The instructions were clear and assembly was very straightforward and the table looks great. One thing worth noting is that the legs are made of very, very thin metal. This is acceptable at a sub-$50 price point, but I would’ve felt better about it’s sturdiness if the metal was a bit thicker. Ensure that you don’t over-tighten the screws when you’re assembling otherwise you’ll probably compress the metal tube irreparably.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Easy to build. It was a little scuffed on faux wood. Nothing a marker couldn't fix.
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Nice Looking
customer_reviews.text: For $64, this is a steal. I got the dark walnut finish and it looks exactly like the photo. No instructions but easy to assemble, took me 10 mins. The metal legs has the same color finish as the dark walnut table look. Looks great! Solid but not heavy duty. The table top is wood, stained dark brown and a little rough in texture. But fine for the price. The table top is not varnished (more environmentally friendly) so be careful as wet items may leave a mark. Easy enough to to add varnish if you want. Fits the narrow hallway nook perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: CiCi

customer_reviews.title: Looooovvveee it
customer_reviews.text: I love this table! Neselted in the corner, under my husband’s gigantic tv which I hate and my children’s junk all over my living...you will find this super beautiful table! Something pretty for me! It’s perfectly sized and the top is beautiful. He stock photos do not do it justice. Super incredibly easy to put together. I would 100% recommend it and great quality for the price. I might buy another for my hallway upstairs
customer_reviews.author: BreannaM

customer_reviews.title: Does the job, kind of junky
customer_reviews.text: This shelf is kind of junky. Mine came damaged, with chunks out of the top finish. Parts of the metal were not flat, and the tabletop did not line up evenly. I kept it because I’m only using it for plants in front of a window. So I don’t need it to be a nice piece of furniture that people see, but I would NOT BUY this for any main piece of decoration/furniture. Too expensive for the quality! Pro tip: don’t tighten all the screws until they’re all in place. For any furniture like this you need the wiggle room to get everything in place, then go tighten everything at the end.
customer_reviews.author: NoVa

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something about two inches taller but everything else cost double so I chose this. The height is actually just fine. I’m happy with it. It looks good and the price is fine. I’d rate it 4 stars because even though I am a prime member and selected two day shipping it took 12 days to get to me. Not the end of the world, but slightly annoying. The top piece has a small amount of scuffing, but is not noticeable from a short distance away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great value, and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: this is a great value for what this furniture is. i've had this for a few weeks and it is holding up very well. with that said, i'm only putting random items like cups and phones on it, so i don't know how it will fare if you start loading it up with olympic-class gym weights. assembly was super easy as well. i was actually able to put it together without looking at the manual. it gives you all the parts you need: screws and an allen wrench. everything fits very well without any nonsense. would very much recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M. R.

customer_reviews.title: Missing washers
customer_reviews.text: The console table was nice enough, but the items came missing the washers that were shown in the instructions. I just put it together without them. I’m disappointed, but too busy to go through calling customer service for washer replacements. They need to work on quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: We used this for one trade show and we are going to retire it to our spare bedroom. I really want to get this wobbly piece of junk out of my home though, but the wife wants to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Super duper easy to assemble and seems very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put in a ladies room at the office. A place for purses, etc and it looks so nice. Simple and contemporary design. Came in a really strong box with corner reinforcement and Styrofoam inside. No damage at all on the top or legs. Only 2 different bolts made it super easy to screw together. I could finer tighten each bolt and just use the tool for 1 final turn. Well made and cute!
customer_reviews.author: Althea Riley

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is just the right size for my plants and it looks so nice. It's so easy to put together and it's sturdy. The price is a little high, but it wasn't easy finding a smaller table like this so it was worth it. I might buy another one... Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Clean. Minimal. Sturdy. Perfect for Foyers, Offices, Cable management, and more!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this a year ago, and am about to purchase 3 more! This has been a wonderful, sleek, sturdy, and clean side-table for our household. Original a side-table in my office, I purchased it for it's clean design, and wooden-top. Now, a year later, we've moved it to our Foyer, where it has become a perfect entryway/welcome table. The legs are strong metal, and perfect to attach cable-management hooks to. The underside of the wooden-top is perfect for cable-management as well, as it is sufficiently recessed to hide any hooks, pads, screws, etc you may use to hide wires. Goes with a plethora of interior/room aesthetics, and definitely worth the money. Look forward to our next 3 arriving soon!
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Screws didn’t match some of the holes
customer_reviews.text: Cons: * one of my screws did not fit in its intended hole, I follow directions to a T; screw would not fit, it’s the bottom piece, the number (3) screws. i was still able to use this table without attaching this piece but poor construction. * this table is extremely wobbly; which I’m not sure if it’s because the bottom piece wasnt attach. Pro *if the screws were a perfect fit; then I would say it was easy to assemble, but because mines didn’t fit as easy, I had a harder time. * table looks nice; came as expected
customer_reviews.author: chatoria jones

customer_reviews.title: Not really a sofa table more like a desk
customer_reviews.text: This is labeled as a sofa table but is much shorter than expected. It sits more like a desk. It is very narrow also. Can’t fault the product as they have dimensions listed but I was expecting something taller at least when the description. “ sofa table” was used. Easy to assemble but not very sturdy. My roomba can knock it over when there is nothing on top of it. It’s very light.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Wasson

customer_reviews.title: Most beautiful table I have ever seen
customer_reviews.text: This tabe is light, sturdy, and aesthetically pleasing. It is small enough to fit anywhere. I wish the table was higher as I thought it was a high table. Nonetheless, I will be keeping. Also, please know that the metal is easy to bend in set up (or so hubby tells me), which is only con. Otherwise this is a great accent table. Can not beat the price for the value.
customer_reviews.author: ohemaa

customer_reviews.title: It has a nice shape and nice lines
customer_reviews.text: It has a nice shape and nice lines. the top piece of wood looks cheap- but then again I guess it is
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Table!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this console table for my bedroom. It's just the perfect size to fit under my wall mounted TV. It was super easy to put together. I assembled it by myself in about 30 minutes. (Someone more skilled probably could have done it in less time.) It was a great price and seems very sturdy. The wood is a nice color too. I plan to purchase another one. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Lakeisha B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Sooooooooo easy to assemble. It took me a longer time to unwrap it than set it up! It feels very sturdy and it is gorgeous I am so happy with my purchase and I intend to buy another
customer_reviews.author: Peta Marie

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive
customer_reviews.text: On the plus side it looks exactly like the pictures and is very easy to assemble. I didn’t even look at the instructions and I was done in 10 minutes. It’s very sleek and perfect for my needs. Downside is it’s a little wobbly even after I tightened every last screw. And I would price it more around $45. But, all in all, I’m happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Monty D

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and fits a 43" TV
customer_reviews.text: I was happy about the east install. Even happier when my new 43" TV fit nicely. I would say purchase this if you are looking for a smaller fit in a tight space (my apt is 550 square ft). An entrance or hallway would also work nicely. It has met my needs for this type of an item. BC
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great for its purpose
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sofa table. It's long and skinny. We bought two to fit between the wall and couch to put our steaming devices, remotes, and controllers. It's the perfect height, slightly shorter than our couches, so it's not very visible when you enter our family room. Easy to assemble, shipped quickly, sturdy too (my toddler tested that by climbing on top of it before we could stop her!).
customer_reviews.author: cabbs

customer_reviews.title: Get it for sure!
customer_reviews.text: I love this table! Bought it for our new house entryway. It is a bit low, but since I couldn't decide if I wanted a console or a bench, this actually really works! It was super easy to put together. Simple, smart design, everything fits together well. Looks very sharp with a few accessories. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Scoobaru

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Didn't really know what to expect and how many pieces were going to come that would require assembly. The pieces were few and I put it together alone in about 15 minutes. (Most of that time was from losing the allen wrench that I kept placing down. The table is very sturdy and is perfect for my space. I also ordered the matching end tables that are coming next week. Glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Borowski

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this by accident and had intended on returning it, but something kept telling me to put it together first. I'm glad I did because it fits behind our sectional perfectly, and for the cost is good quality. The edges are a bit sharp, so I feel it need to be kind of out of reach for really little ones. But overall this was a great mistake on my part! (I have a 3 year old and a 6 month old)
customer_reviews.author: EA

customer_reviews.title: Worth it! Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an affordable and simple/stylish console table everywhere when I came across this one and its reviews. The positive reviews convinced me to buy it and I would do it again! Easy to build and looks great. I would just recommend to check out the dimensions as it is quite low but I knew that before buying due to other reviews. Hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Lis W.

customer_reviews.title: Short but cute and great value
customer_reviews.text: Super cute entry table and great for the price. My only complaint is that it’s pretty short.. standard height for console tables is around 30”-32” but this one is 28”. If you intend to set a mirror on it like mine, it doesn’t sit up high enough for anyone over 5’0 tall so you might opt for a taller table in that case.
customer_reviews.author: BJT

customer_reviews.title: Great foyer table
customer_reviews.text: Arrived sooner than expected! Easy to put together. You don’t need any special tools and can do by yourself. Worked perfectly for my foyer and my was able to tuck the dog bowls under it with no problem. Clutter and crowded foyer be gone! 4 stars for sturdiness but just fine. I’d buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: genabeebers

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a table for behind my couch without a low shelf as I don’t want to block the vent. This met that need. It’s actually so nice that I now hate hiding it behind my couch!!i preferred a skinnier table but that is 100% preference and no fault of the table. It was so easy to put together and is now stylish and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: mufin281

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy to Put Together
customer_reviews.text: This went together easily and is sturdy enough to serve most purposes that a sofa table would serve. I have a few plants on mine right now. It is on the lower side, as others have mentioned, but fits behind my low couch nicely. This is best suited to a certain look in a home or between the couch and wall given its plain, metal structure. But it works perfectly for my needs and was very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: K. Prell-Emmo

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size! I wanted a table that wasn't to intrusive but also wasn't so small that I might as well not even have a table. I can fit some of the knick knacks and decor I wanted to be on the table, but it also isn't so big that it takes up so much space in a room.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi and Scooter

customer_reviews.title: Decent piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: I recently moved to a new place, and my dad did not seem to have too much of a difficult time assembling this item. It is great for under a mounted TV. It does not seem sturdy enough to hold significant weight, but it is great as a decorative, understated item.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth W

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Like others, I failed to notice dimensions before ordering. Definitely had buyers remorse but it ended up working out after all for my hallway. It looks great! I had a bit of a struggling w a few screws aligning w the from to the table top so I gave up. It doesn’t affect it though
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Good for turning the wall Unit AC into a  plant table
customer_reviews.text: If I can assemble this, so can you. I’m using this table to hold plants, and as soon as I don’t need to run the AC, I’m placing the table over it. It’s sturdy enough for my heavy plants and I will cover it with a pretty cloth so I won’t have to see the ugly wall unit AC all winter.
customer_reviews.author: In My Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Cute but cheap
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cute table. It’s just a cheap table. My 5 year old was able to carry the table. It’s very narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Simple Use
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use as an outdoor tv stand on our porch. Works for the use perfectly. Was easy to assemble, has held up well outside, great height and also sturdy (it hold our 42" tv, heavy table fan and flower pots) no problem. highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Katlin

customer_reviews.title: Very well packed in box and nice looking!
customer_reviews.text: We got the smoky oak and it is a very nice looking table. It goes behind the couch so nobody sees it but it has very clean lines. The box it came in was well packaged and secure so there were no dings or scratches on the item..that is so rare nowadays! Awesome job!
customer_reviews.author: Platypus

customer_reviews.title: Pretty amazing, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. Very stable. Looks nice. Arrived well packaged. We had to sort through alot of options to find a table this height in this price range, and it's perfect. I'm honestly pretty surprised... at this price, I expected it to be lower quality, flimsy, something.... nope! So yeah, this is one of those reviews where it's a legit 5 star, and the price is killer.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Nice console table.
customer_reviews.text: This table was perfect for my entry way. I needed something narrow for our bi-level entry. I'm very happy with my purchase, top is not real wood but it looks pretty and arrived in great condition, it was fast and super easy to put together, table was no wobbling or nothing.
customer_reviews.author: AngyWat

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very low-profile, simple and clean lines. Wouldn’t set anything heavy but perfect for a small hallway entry or for decor. Set my perfumes and a couple of knickknacks in my bedroom, quite happy with it! Kids basically assembled it for me, very easy!
customer_reviews.author: Rowada

customer_reviews.title: beautiful and easy to put together!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews, but rarely does the product so greatly exceed my expectations! Value was exceptional ( a fraction of the price you would pay elsewhere). The quality and aesthetics were a 10! I have a lake cottage that I needed a small “desk” due to space constrictions. I love the metal and light wood. Super easy for me to put together, too (20min).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect
customer_reviews.text: Delivered fast. Was packaged real well. I put it together in under 30 minutes. I needed something to rest my coffee cup on and this fits so perfectly behind my ikea sofa !! I plan to add some books and decorative items later. Great value for money ! I might get another to use as an entryway table.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn K

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this table for close to a year and have been really happy with the purchase. I’m careful to not let any standing water sit for too long and always use protection under terra-cotta pots as I think it would likely damage the surface. For the price, it’s a great table that does the job it’s intended for!
customer_reviews.author: K. Pie

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something my plants could sit on but would also be able to fit the dog bowls under it it. This table has worked out perfectly. It does it exactly what I wanted it for. It was easy to put together and didn’t take long at all.
customer_reviews.author: Bryn Salisbury

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Entryway table!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I bought this product! It has enhanced my entryway and was so easy to put together. It is made with good quality and the price was amazing! I would definitely recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: Rhea

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, looks great.
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy something like this online but the price was right, the size was right, so I went for it. Needed something to put dog food on in the laundry room in order to reclaim so.space and it's perfect. Was a breeze to put together, study construction, I live that the bottom is open so I can keep the dogs kennel and water underneath. I'm considering buying a second one to use as a decorative piece in my entry way
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Bierle

customer_reviews.title: Using it as a desk
customer_reviews.text: I know what you are thinking, but the computer that this is for is mounted on the wall. So the only thing that we needed a table for was the mouse and keyboard. It works great. The only drawl back for us, is that we would have liked it a little longer, but beggars are not choosers and it works well in the place that it sits.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged, bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Just received this today... damaged!! The corner is damaged and the top is heavily scratched up! Luckily it was only $60 and going into our “mother in law” studio apartment so it won’t be seen too often. You get what you pay for quality wise. Really easy assembly though so I guess that’s a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice look and good deal
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Good height for behind my couch in the living room. Surface is veneer. Not real wood but better because I have plants on it and I don’t have to worry about stray water droplets. Great industrial style for a good price
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Cute but wobbly
customer_reviews.text: Used it as a narrow kitchen table. Bar stools fit under on the lowest setting. Was a little wobbly and not very sturdy, but it does the job. It’s cute and I do like it, but I probably wouldn’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely obsessed with this little table!!! It is so cute! I put it together by myself in about 10 minutes. Amazing quality!! Came fast! Very satisfied and would highly recommend!!! It came with all of the screws needed. Now I can go shopping for things to put on it!
customer_reviews.author: JLou

customer_reviews.title: Favorite piece of furniture - you can hide a shoe rack under it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this table for my entry way, and found it perfectly fits an expandable shoe rack under it, doubling it's utility! I get a lot of compliments on it and haven't had any issues after almost a year of use. It's quite sturdy and supports a large mirror I keep in the entry way.
customer_reviews.author: Mar-Bar

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money. Looks beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful little console table. Works great with my decor. It was easy to assemble too.
customer_reviews.author: Lepamimi

customer_reviews.title: Alternative to a vanity
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this as a makeup area in my bathroom and it fits perfectly and feels less clunky than a vanity. My only complaint is that it's not level once assembled so it wobbles. Ended up putting a thick furniture pad on one of the feet to prevent this.
customer_reviews.author: jaimie

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This was so simple to assemble and the color is exactly what I was looking for! I didn’t want a huge bulky tv stand in our bedroom and decided to get this instead and I’m so glad I did it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Ayriana

customer_reviews.title: Solid, good purchase
customer_reviews.text: My table arrived yesterday, packed well, took me all of 10 minutes to put it together. Solid, strong, attractive, glad I purchased it. I would recommend this table, would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Nice but arrived with some defect
customer_reviews.text: I love this sofa table and it looks great in my house. however- the item arrived with one bent rod which was on the bottom support portion. I decided just to keep it anyway because it is sturdy enough without that one screw....but kinda bugged me...so that is why only 4 stars...
customer_reviews.author: Marion Pena

customer_reviews.title: This table is EXACTLY what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: This table is PERFECT for what I’m using it for. Picture this: in my kitchen to have my recycling bins under and use the top for other items! Because the bottom support bar is in the back, this allows me to put my bins under. It’s perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cozi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, top scratches easily
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice and minimalist, which is what I wanted. It is easy to assemble and does not wobble. The top is wood with laminate, which scratches with anything sharp, like the table leg.
customer_reviews.author: jmumv

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I need
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put behind my couch. It wasn't the original one I wanted, but I got it because the hight was closer to what I was looking for. It was easy to put together and only took a few minutes. It seems pretty sturdy and works perfectly for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically pleasing, simple  and slim
customer_reviews.text: I ended up ordering two of these I loved it so much! I’m using them lined up as a behind the sofa table/mini bar (18 inch stools). Couldn’t be happier, best bang for your buck according to my research.
customer_reviews.author: E. Dudley

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my tiny apartment and it is perfect. I place 2 amazon canvas hampers under it for extra storage and am really happy with the result. Very sturdy. Great item for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ametrine60

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Strong Accent Table
customer_reviews.text: This sofa table is a perfect fit for behind my desk to hold my printers. It is only 12 inches front to back but long enough to accommodate two medium size printers. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: eve

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't feel very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It's not my favorite look and it seems pretty weak, but it does the job okay.
customer_reviews.author: megan smith

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal entryway table!
customer_reviews.text: This table was super easy to assemble. I didn’t it myself in under 20 minutes. It’s very sturdy and beautifully designed. Great to use for a entryway table! Pictures don’t do it justice.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon C

customer_reviews.title: Simple and classy
customer_reviews.text: Little smaller then expected but we will keep it. It works perfectly fine at the entrance where you just need something to decorate the foyer. This size is also perfect as a side table or behind the sofa.
customer_reviews.author: Dagmara C.

customer_reviews.title: Great find!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sofa tables. I have two purchased months apart as they hold plants between sofa and west facing window. I appreciate the clean, classic lines. I have also purchased a chair table.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: perfect console table!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely just what I was looking for. Was able to put together in about 10 minutes and feels pretty sturdy, honestly. Since I'm using this for plants by my window, I'm glad this isn't real wood as it would most likely end up with water stains! Would definitely purchase again if I need something similar.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I like the minimal design of this table. It was really easy to put together, it's sturdy and doesn't wobble. I'm comfortable using it for a TV stand and not worried that it's not strong or stable enough to hold it safely.
customer_reviews.author: Denver

customer_reviews.title: Great table!
customer_reviews.text: We used this as our console table, and it's excellent! I (the wife) assembled this solo, too..and was super proud of myself. It's not hard at all ; ) Definitely sturdy, well built, and looks great in our house
customer_reviews.author: Amy Gerlach Puckett

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a table to accent a wall but nothing to flashy. This was perfect! I have 2 different tables in my place and this by fabrics is the cheapest and my favorite ! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t expect much from such an affordable piece of furniture but I was pleasantly surprised! It’s beautiful to look at, sturdy, very easy to put together and it was extremely well packaged. The box had a dent on it and the table wasn’t damaged at all. I just received it and put it together today and I already want to buy a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Diana M

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loveeeeee this! I purchased 2 of them for my sectional and added stools for additional seating when we entertain!
customer_reviews.author: Jax Kaiks

customer_reviews.title: I love this table
customer_reviews.text: I love this table! It was packaged very well, all pieces were included and table top was in perfect condition, it was very easy to put together, less than 20 minutes. I'm using this table for plant storage, I plan on buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: T. Greene

customer_reviews.title: Great for virtual meetings
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for table to hold my laptop and TV monitor to which it was attached. Needed for virtual meetings where multiple computers and monitors were needed.
customer_reviews.author: lkept

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I knew length wise it would be on the small side but I do wish it was wider. But I do like it and will meet my need to have a table for plants in the window.
customer_reviews.author: MyGoodOpinion

customer_reviews.title: Good product, slightly damaged in packing
customer_reviews.text: The product was easy to assemble and is fine, but the wood was chipped when it arrived in three identical spots on either side of the surface of the table. Not a big deal, but kind of annoying and probably seen across products because the chips were on the exact points where it was tied together for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

product_meta.title: Sauder North Avenue Sofa Table, Charter Oak finish
product_meta.description: Color:Charter Oak| Design:Sofa TableEnhance your home décor with this sofa table from the North Avenue collection. Its narrow tabletop provides the perfect space to display photos, plants, knick-knacks and more. Constructed with a durable, black metal frame and finished on all surfaces in characters Oak, this industrial inspired stand adds an extra touch of style to any room.
feature_bullets: Finished on all sides for versatile placement
Assembled dimensions: L: 41.496" x W: 11.496" x H: 28.031"

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,566 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
